note: Named from one of my favorite verses from the poem El Cantar del Mio Cid. Just an ordinary person working at an ordinary job, living currently in Las Vegas NV. He/him. Left socialist outlook. Also interests in science and ancient history. I prefer not to mention any identifying information in my bio; I aim to keep my social media life and real life separate, though not for any dramatic reason. I mostly comment on politics, activism, ancient history, science.
